mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS pid, p.problem_id, p.title, p.difficulty, p.type , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM judge j WHERE j.pid = p.id AND j.status = 0) as ac, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM judge j WHERE j.pid = p.id) as total FROM problem p, training_problem tp where p.id = tp.pid and p.auth = 1 and tp.tid = #{tid} order by tp.`rank` asc
